channel.title: Adding ::Admin and ::mod?
channel.description: how would i add these plz.

item.title: Adding ::Admin and ::mod?
item.dc:creator: @ill_pk_ur_as ill pk ur as
item.description:
@ill_pk_ur_as wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(4);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            sendMessage(name + " has been made mod.");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist.");
        }
    }

    if (command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights >= 3) { 
        String name = command.substring(6);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            sendMessage(name + " has been made administrator.");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist.");
        }
    }

    if (command.startsWith("demod") && playerRights >= 3) { 
        String name = command.substring(6);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            sendMessage(name + " is no longer a mod or admin.");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist.");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
